body_html: Time major is more efficient with rnns, but dynamic_rnn was made batch major for consistency with the rest of tf. Since most users of CTC are experts, and are clearly going to be combining it with rnns, we are encouraging users to use time major here as well. If you're using dynamic_rnn, I encourage you to use the flag time_major=True for efficiency.
body_text: Time major is more efficient with rnns, but dynamic_rnn was made batch major for consistency with the rest of tf. If you're using dynamic_rnn, I encourage you to use the flag time_major=True for efficiency.
body: Time major is more efficient with rnns, but dynamic_rnn was made batch major for consistency with the rest of tf.  Since most users of CTC are experts, and are clearly going to be combining it with rnns, we are encouraging users to use time major here as well.  If you're using dynamic_rnn, I encourage you to use the flag time_major=True for efficiency.
